评论详情: Stumbled upon RTR and purchased pre owned clothes to start, which was a huge fail. Clothes were so very worn (especially this very tired sweater, I donate clothes well before they reach this level of use). Overall with RTR pre owned experience was non hygienic as I found a long hair on an item and one sweater smelled horrible. I returned every single item very grossed out. After reading further I realized the RTR collective are brand new clothes. Make the switch!
Colors are really nice, sweater is soft and sleeves are a nice longer length. Unfortunately its very cropped, can't lift my arms without it coming too far up.
